items.description: We have recently modified and enhanced the security of the API system.

customEndpoints.name: Config Echo
customEndpoints.description: Echoes back the input parameter, defined entirely in configuration.json
customEndpoints.code: const msg = req.query.msg || 'Hello from config!'; res.json({ status: true, message: msg });
